subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Roush Racing announced on Wednesday that David Ragan, a driver in the third-tier Craftsman Truck Series, would take over the No. 6 car next season.
snippet: Roush Racing announced on Wednesday that David Ragan, a driver in the third-tier Craftsman Truck Series, would take over the No. 6 car next season.
